top_comments.comment: Dont mind me I'm just taking a turd in the litter box, dont look

Covid is a plandemic. Plain and simple. Only idiots believe covid is real now. comments_since_last_sample.body: State with a lot’s of cuvid should be mandatory lockdown mandatory vaccination during pandemic the government should be in controlled people with cuvid should stayed in their house they should obey government mandate that we can eradicate the pandemic soon

I think libs failed to realize that we could have reached herd immunity faster if we didn't wear masks, used social distancing, or rely on lockdowns. Sure, we would have had several more deaths, but our ultimate form of herd immunity would have been much higher.
